This statistic shows the dietary supplement usage among U.S. adults in 2020, by household income. In 2020, 75 percent of households in the United States used dietary supplements as their primary source of nutrition.

This statistic shows the top reasons for dietary supplement use among U.S. adults in 2019. During the survey, 25 percent of respondents stated that they had taken a dietary supplement for their health.
This statistic shows the global reach rate of brand Instagram stories 2018-2019, by account size. During the measured period, 10.4 percent of Instagram users reached 10.4 percent of their followers.

This statistic shows the top dietary supplement usage growth due to COVID in U.S. adults 2020. In the United States, multivitamin was the leading dietary supplement with a growth of 60 percent due to the coronavirus pandemic.
This statistic shows the website bounce rate on cosmetic companies in France in 2020. In 2020, 60 percent of French websites had a bounce rate of 10 percent.

This statistic shows the weekly S & P 500 index performance in the week of January 2022. The weekly S & P 500 index is a composite index that measures the development of the S&P 500 index from January 2020 to January 2022.

This statistic shows the potential challenges in remote working in Poland in 2020. During the survey period, 30 percent of respondents stated that they had difficulty to communicate with their customers/contractors.
This statistic shows the number of students in tertiary education in Tunisia 2014-2019, by gender. In 2019, there were 200,000 students in tertiary education in Tunisia.

This statistic shows the number of victims of criminal offences in Norway from 2009 to 2019, by type of crime. In 2019, there were 6,230 criminal offences for property theft, 2,200 drug and alcohol offences, 2,000 criminal offences for profit, 2,000 criminal damage order and integrity violations.

This statistic shows the impact on tech companies' revenue and expenses worldwide 2020. During the survey period, 40 percent of respondents stated that their revenue decreased significantly due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic.

This statistic shows the increase in medical app downloads during the peak of the coronavirus epidemic by country in 2020. During the measured period, the number of medical app downloads increased by approximately 120 percent compared to the previous year.
This statistic shows the number of police violence complaints in Brazil from 2011 to 2019. In 2019, approximately 1.67 million people were victims of police violence in Brazil.

This statistic shows the COVID-19 pandemic's effect on tech employees productivity levels with WFH 2020. During the survey period, 54 percent of respondents stated that they were more or less productive working from home.
This statistic shows the number of police officers killed in Brazil in 2020, by state. In Brazil, the state of Bahia had the highest number of police deaths in 2020, with 43.4 deaths.

This statistic shows the compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of vertical farming worldwide between 2020 and 2027, by select country. In 2020, the compound annual growth rate of vertical farming in the United States was 25.4 percent.
In January 2020, the average monthly prices for round rebar iron in Egypt amounted to approximately 12,000 Egyptian pounds per metric ton.

This statistic shows the impact of canceling live sports as of March 2020. During the survey, 44 percent of respondents stated that they had the impact of the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic on their daily life.
This statistic shows the North American sugar output by country 1885-1988. In 1885, the USA's sugar from cane was 1.77 percent.

This statistic shows the unit cost of recycling in Japan in 2022, by packaging. In 2022, the packaging cost of plastic bottles, amber, and glass bottles amounted to about 50 Japanese yen per kilogram.
This statistic shows the number of people in prison in Norway in 2018, by type of crime. In that year, there were 3,500 prisoners in prison, followed by 1,000 in the capital city of Oslo.
In January 2020, the average price for black wood in Egypt was 9,000 euros. This was down from 9,000 euros in March 2019.

This statistic shows the opinion on the rules on abortion in Poland in 2020. In the first half of 2020, the majority of the respondents stated that the rules on abortion should be legal in certain cases.

This statistic shows the value of cultural recovery fund (CRF) grants awarded to arts and culture organizations in England as of November 7, 2020, by funding round. The value of CRF grants was around 250 million British pounds, while the value of the funding round was around 250 million pounds.
This statistic shows seafood department unit sales in the United States in 2019, by variety. In that year, the seafood department sold shrimp, salmon, crab, and other fish.
This statistic shows the monthly value of exports from Egypt from 2019-2020, by segment. In January 2020, the value of petroleum products amounted to approximately 2.5 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the monthly packaged units of medical cannabis extracts sold in Canada from October 2019 to March 2021. In March 2021, approximately 280,000 medical cannabis extracts were sold in Canada.

This statistic shows the conditions managed by medical cannabis among Canadian patients in 2020. During the survey period, 44 percent of Canadian patients reported using medical cannabis for select conditions.

This statistic shows the total number of new cases in Czechia in 2020-2022, by age and gender. The total number of new cases in Czechia amounted to approximately 166.4 thousand, while the total number of new cases in the country amounted to approximately 116.4 thousand.

This statistic shows the reduction of other medications due to medical cannabis among Canadian patients in 2020. In 2020, 40 percent of the patients with the drug had no reduction in their medications.

This statistic shows the impact of COVID-19 on medical cannabis purchasing among Canadian patients in 2020. During the survey period, 64 percent of respondents stated that they had taken longer to access the medical cannabis product.
This statistic shows the use of fertilizer for agriculture in Algeria between 2015-2019, by nutrient. In 2019, the use of fertilizer for agriculture in Algeria was about 8.4 percent.
This statistic shows the monthly value of exports from Suez port in Egypt 2019-2020. In January 2020, the value of Suez Port amounted to approximately 2.5 percent.
This statistic shows the monthly value of exports from Dekheila port in Egypt in 2019-2020. In January 2020, the value of Dekheila port amounted to approximately 2.5 percent.

This statistic shows the main concerns of the society during the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic in Poland in 2020. The Polish economy is expected to be extremely worried about the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic. For further information about the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on the Romanian government guaranteeing income without work requirement in 2019. During the survey period, 40 percent of respondents stated that they would not receive a guaranteed income from the state without work requirement.

This statistic shows the production of glass fiber reinforced plastics (GRP) in Spain and Portugal from 2012 to 2020. In 2020, the production of GRP in Spain amounted to approximately 165.5 million metric tons.

This statistic shows the main concerns of Poles about material goods in Poland 2020. During the survey period, 64 percent of the respondents stated that they were most afraid of buying or selling metal.

This statistic shows the items bought second-hand by the French in clothing, textile and shoes category 2018. During the survey period, 60 percent of the respondents stated that they bought second-hand clothing for women.

This statistic shows the CDA stock exchange rate growth due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic in Poland in 2020. During the measured period, the stock exchange rate increased by approximately 40 percent compared to the previous period.
This statistic shows the market capitalization of the Barrick Gold 2019-2020. In October 2020, the market capitalization of the Barrick Gold was around 60.4 billion Canadian dollars.
This statistic shows the share of child slaves along select routes 1636-1867. In 1636, the Dutch slave population increased by approximately 23.5 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic shows the religious involvement during the coronavirus pandemic in Poland in 2020. During the survey period, 66 percent of respondents stated that they devoted as much time to prayer, meditation and other religious projects during the coronavirus pandemic.

This statistic shows the annual value of natural rubber exports from Singapore from 2016 to 2020. In 2020, Singapore's annual natural rubber exports amounted to approximately 112.4 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the distribution of Romanians who prefer working from home in 2020, by frequency. In 2020, 25 percent of respondents in Romania preferred working from home.
This statistic shows the opinion of French parents on their daughter having so-called "boy" toys 2019. In 2019, 63 percent of the parents stated that they already had "boy" toys.

This statistic shows the prevalence of mental distress among U.S. adults with a disability in 2018, by gender. In 2018, the prevalence of mental distress among U.S. adults with a disability was 35.4 percent.

This statistic shows the reasons why U.S. physicians upset for select reasons during the coronavirus pandemic in August 2020. During the survey period, 54 percent of respondents stated that they were not at all upset for selecting a doctor during the coronavirus pandemic.

This statistic shows the share of U.S. physicians who experienced select changes due to COVID-19, 2020-2021. In July 2020, 63 percent of the respondents reported a reduction in income reduced to a primarily telemedicine clinic, compared to 63 percent of the respondents who had previously been employed in a non-patient care.

This statistic shows the intention to get vaccinated against the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic in Brazil as of May 2021. During the survey period, 60 percent of Brazilian respondents stated that they planned to get vaccinated against the virus.
This statistic shows the total COVID-19 cases in Ukraine 2022, by region. In Kyiv, the total number of COVID-19 cases in the country amounted to approximately 400,000.
This statistic shows the trade value of Peru from 2015 to 2019, by trade flow type. In 2019, the value of Peru amounted to approximately 48.4 percent.

This statistic shows the effectiveness of government actions regarding the coronavirus epidemic in Poland 2020. During the survey period, 35 percent of respondents stated that they had a chance to limit the growth of the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic in Poland.
This statistic shows the number of marriages in Algeria from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, there were approximately 380 marriages in Algeria.

This statistic shows the share of Canadians who would get vaccinated for COVID-19 in Canada from September 23 to March 24, 2020. In March 2020, 69 percent of Canadians would be vaccinated for COVID-19.

This statistic shows the opinion on measures to fight the coronavirus ( COVID-19) in Great Britain 2020. During the survey period, 80 percent of respondents stated that they would be more likely to reduce the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic.

This statistic shows the export value of agriculture, hunting, and fishery products from Algeria from 2014-2019. In 2019, Algeria exported approximately 12.5 billion Algerian dollars of hunting and fishing products.
This statistic shows the production value of the leading agricultural products in Algeria in 2018. In that year, the value of cereal and potatoes amounted to approximately 3.5 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the extent of following COVID-19 related news in Hungary 2020. During the survey period, 64 percent of respondents stated that they followed the same type of news as other types of news.

This statistic shows the rate of insufficient physical activity in Latin America between 2001 and 2016, by country. In 2016, Brazil was the country with the highest rate of insufficient physical activity, with 44 percent of the population being unable to concentrate.

This statistic shows the number of deaths in the shipbuilding industry in South Korea from 2015 to 2019, by work experience. In 2019, there were 30.4 thousand deaths in the construction industry in South Korea.

This statistic shows the travel destinations of Romanian nationals who tested positive for the coronavirus (COVID-19) from February to March 2020, by country. In March 2020, 35 percent of the Romanian nationals were infected with the virus.

This statistic shows the real GDP growth in Romania in 2020-2021, by scenario. In 2020, the real GDP growth in Romania was at approximately 2.4 percent. This is down from a double-hit scenario in 2019, when it was at approximately 6.4 percent.

This statistic shows the number of direct jobs created by the app economy in the European Union from January 2016 to July 2019. In July 2019, approximately 660 direct jobs were created in the European Union.

This statistic shows the consumer price index (CPI) for food and non-alcoholic beverages in Ghana from August 2019 to April 2021, by subgroup. In April 2021, the consumer price index for vegetables, tubers, plantains, and non-alcoholic beverages in Ghana was 120.4, meaning that it was 120.4 percent lower than in the previous month.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Algeria 2010-2019, by gender. In 2010, the unemployment rate in Algeria was at approximately 20.4 percent.

This statistic shows the distribution of Hungarians who did not buy Christmas gifts for 2020. During the survey period, 84 percent of the Hungarians stated they did not buy Christmas gifts for their family.

This statistic shows the opinions of U.S. adults on the benefits of e-cigarette products and how they can help people put their health through the process of switching to the new method of nicotine. In 2020, 55 percent of respondents stated that they would like to see e-cigarette products improving their health through the use of natural ingredients.

This statistic shows the global confidence level in business ability to understand cyber threats 2019. During the survey period, 65 percent of respondents from the manufacturing and other industries stated that they had a high level of confidence in their business ability to understand cyber threats.

This statistic shows the requests to delist website content from Google in Denmark as of November 2020, by category. During the survey period, 20 percent of respondents stated that they had been found to be insufficent information on the website.
This statistic shows the total volume of French imports and exports of used textile articles and rags 2015-2019. In 2019, the value of French articles amounted to approximately 1.76 million euros.
This statistic shows the clinical trial starts for novel heart failure drugs U.S. 2009-2018, by stage. In 2018, the stage of clinical trial for novel heart failure drugs was 1.5 percent.

This statistic shows the sales growth of hygiene and household products due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic in Argentina. In March 2020, 35 percent of the household insecticide sales were due to the use of soaps.
This statistic shows the number of registered mobile money customers in Uganda from 2015 to 2021. In 2021, the number of mobile money customers in Uganda amounted to approximately 33.4 million.
This statistic shows the online searches on The Queen's Gambit 2020 in Mexico. On October 18, 2020, the online search was found on the website of the Mexican government.
This statistic shows the proved natural gas reserves in Angola from 2016 to 2020. In 2020, Angola's natural gas reserves amounted to approximately 440 billion cubic metric tons.
This statistic shows the natural gas demand in Angola from 2016 to 2020. In 2020, the natural gas demand in Angola amounted to around 820.7 billion cubic meters.

This statistic shows the number of foreign students enrolled in higher education degrees in Spain in the academic year 2019/2020, by origin. In 2020, approximately 3.5 thousand Spanish students were enrolled in higher education degrees in Spain.
This statistic shows the number of employees working at Shin-Etsu Chemical, Ltd. from fiscal year 2011-2020. In fiscal year 2020, the company's employees amounted to approximately 24.4 million.

This statistic shows the leading internet activities among young people in Norway in 2020. During the survey period, 85 percent of Norwegian teenagers stated that they had an instant message or video from sharing with friends or family.
This statistic shows the foreign population in selected European countries in 1960, 1976 and 1990. In 1960, there were approximately 5.5 million people living in Germany.

This statistic shows the impact in time spent video gaming during the COVID-19 pandemic among PC gamers in the United States as of June 2020, by genre. During the survey period, 20 percent of respondents stated that they spent time playing multiplayer games during the coronavirus pandemic.

This statistic shows the impact of the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic on the exports and/or entered new markets in Poland in March 2020. During the survey period, it was found that 44 percent of the respondents stated that the level of exports level of company processed products has not changed.

This statistic shows the number of coronavirus (COVID-19) cases for every 100 thousand people in Estonia in the last 14 days confirmed in Estonia as of January 2022, by region. Laane maakond, a maakond-virus maskond, was the region with the highest number of cases for every 100 thousand people in the country.
This statistic shows the total amount of private consumption in Vietnam from 2012 to 2020. In 2020, private consumption amounted to approximately 68.5 percent of Vietnam's total GDP.

This statistic shows the opinion on the mandatory wearing masks in public places in Russia in 2020. During the survey period, 84 percent of respondents stated that they did not support wearing a mask in public places.

This statistic shows the average retail prices of wheat flour in Russia from 2017 to 2020. In 2020, the average retail price of wheat flour in Russia amounted to approximately 42.4 Russian rubles per kilogram.

This statistic shows the opinion on returning to pre-perestroika times in Russia 1995-2020. During the survey period, 50 percent of respondents stated that they were going to be returning to pre-perestroika in the next 10 to 2020.
This statistic shows the share of U.S. black and white 65+ adults who had flu vaccinations from 2009 to 2018. In 2018, 65 percent of the adults in the United States had flu vaccinations.

This statistic shows the impact on the responsibles of caregivers in the United States as of September 2020. During the survey period, 64 percent of respondents stayed about the same as the previous year.

This statistic shows the reasons for cyber stalking ex or current partners according to U.S. adults in December 2019. During the survey period, 44 percent of respondents stated that they had been stalking their ex or current partner for some time.

This statistic shows the most clicked products' categories in the Netherlands on Black Friday 2019. The most popular product category was the console with an average growth of 1,400 percent compared to an average Friday in 2019.

This statistic shows the reasons why the French are ahead in Christmas gift shopping and preparation 2020. During the survey period, 40 percent of the respondents stated that they were ahead in the preparation and purchase of Christmas gifts for the same period last year.
This statistic shows the forecasted electricity generation in France in 2050, by energy source. In 2050, the forecasted electricity generation in France was around 175.5 Terawatt hours.
